version_description:
› Possibilità di selezionare diversi timeframe per i grafici dei mercati IDEM, EUREX e CME
› Miglioramento delle prestazioni generali dell’App.
› Bug fixing

› Aggiunta la possibilità di negoziare CFD sugli indici, CFD sulle obbligazioni, CFD sulle azioni Usa e CFD sulle azioni Inghilterra.
› Bug fixing

>Ripristinata la compatibilità del servizio MaxiPrelievo su iPhone 4 e 4s
>Bux Fixing

› Versione compatibile con iOS7
› Bug Fixing

› Bug Fixing

Nuove funzionalità versione 2.6.1:

› Archivio bonifici: visualizzazione bonifici in ingresso e possibilità di effettuare una ricerca per data
 › Possibilità di annullare o ripetere un bonifico
› Invio email di notifica anche per i bonifici già effettuati
› Carte di credito: aumento plafond e gestione limiti carta
› Nuova sezione Contatti: possibilità di chiedere di essere ricontattati. Richieste dirette via SMS o Email.

› Migliorata gestione del Touch ID
› Visualizzazione Fineco Card Debit
› Aggiunti i mercati azionari Inglese, Svizzero e Finlandese
› Bug Fixing

L’app Fineco più completa di sempre e con una grafica interamente rinnovata.

Principali novità:
› Scelta della pagina di login
› Pagamento bollettini, Mav e Rav con una foto
› Gestione in tempo reale dei limiti di spesa della carta
› Aumento Plafond, Maxi Prelievo e Maxi Acquisto immediati
› Bonifici anche verso Paesi esteri
› Quotazioni in push (aggiornamento automatico in tempo reale)
› Nuove Scheda titolo dettagliata con news e analisi dedicate
› Proteggi ordini con Stop Loss e Take Profit
› Trading su opzioni binarie
› Tweets Center con news finanziarie da fonti selezionate
› Calendario economico con i principali avvenimenti in programma
Bug fixing e miglioramento prestazioni generali dell'app.
› Bug fixing e miglioramento delle prestazioni
With the Fineco App you have all the Fineco products and services at your fingertips, so you can always have the world’s most recommended bank with you.
› Bug fixing

› You can now monitor all spending and inflow easily also with the App
› App improvements and fixes
› Bug fixing

› iPhone X optimization
› Search transactions by keyword
› Bug Fixing
› Bug Fixing

› FACE ID optimization
› Bug Fixing
› Bug Fixing

› Trading on CFDs Logos Day with underlying Equities, Commodity Futures, Indices and Government Bonds
› Bug Fixing
› Bug Fixing
› Bug fixing

› You can swipe news, account transactions and MoneyMap transactions without going back to the list.
› We have added bid and ask quantity of first level book in the trading order entry
› From the summary page of each instrument now you can read all the related news
› Bug fixing

Each update make it faster, simple and innovative.
Starting today you could install the app also on iPad.
Download the latest version, which includes performance improvements and bug fixes.
Thank you for choosing Fineco!

› New bank transfer address book. Now you can:
- order your beneficiary list (easy touch drag&drop)
- modify existing beneficiary
- search beneficiary by name, alias or email

› Bug fixing

› New Multicurrency feature with real time exchange rate

› New Multicurrency feature with real time exchange rate
› Bug fixing

We update the app regularly to make it faster, simple and innovative. Updating your ID will become as simple as taking a picture. Go to Menu › Settings › Personal Profile and follow the instructions.
In addition, this version supports Mobile Code: the service will be activated incrementally and will allow you to confirm your transactions from Fineco website with your iPhone.

Thank you for choosing Fineco!

Now your Fineco app is even smarter! Update it now, share your friend code and invite your friends to open a Fineco Account.
Plus, from today you can change your password directly from your settings.
And as standard, like every update, we’ve improved performance and fixed small bugs.
Thanks for choosing Fineco!

Download the latest version and you will be able to access your payment card’s details directly from the app.
When you request a new card, you can start using it immediately for online purchases by activating the new digital payments option. No need to wait for the actual card to arrive.
We have also improved performance and fixed some bugs.
Thank you for choosing Fineco!

Download the latest version and you will be able to see your PIN card’s code directly from the app:
Menu > Cards > Show card data > Show PIN Code.
To view the PIN code you must have Mobile Code service activated and at least one device linked to the service.
We have also improved performance and fixed some bugs.
Thank you for choosing Fineco!

Download the latest version and you will be able to see your PIN card’s code directly from the app:
Menu > Cards > Show card data > Show PIN Code.
To view the PIN code you must have Mobile Code service activated and at least one device linked to the service.
We have also improved performance and fixed some bugs.
Thank you for choosing Fineco!

New login page
The Fineco App just keeps on getting better!
Download the latest version and explore the new, quicker ways to login into your account. You can now access the App by activating and consenting to Face ID or Touch ID.
We have also improved the performance and repaired some bugs.
Thank you for choosing Fineco.

Open new account
It’s the gift that keeps on giving- you can now open a new account with ease through the Fineco App.
Banking made even simpler.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Thank you for choosing Fineco!
